thread.title: Martin Keown bestows incredibly high praise on Harry Kane by comparing him to two Premier League legends
thread.title_full: Martin Keown bestows incredibly high praise on Harry Kane by comparing him to two Premier League legends

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Martin Keown bestows incredibly high praise on Harry Kane by comparing him to two Premier League legends
text:
Sport Martin Keown bestows incredibly high praise on Harry Kane by comparing him to two Premier League legends The Spurs forward has been in scintillating form so far this season and is joint-top of the Premier League scoring charts Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Martin Keown with high praise for Harry Kane Share this video Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
At 23 years of age, Harry Kane isn't just one of the best strikers in England, he's one of hottest forwards in Europe. 
The Spurs striker has now scored more than 20 goals in each of his last three seasons, a hat-trick against Stoke on Sunday bringing this campaign's total to 22. 
This kind of form sees Kane place seventh in Europe's top scoring charts since 2014/15. The Englishman is in esteemed company, pipping the likes of Sergio Aguero, Neymar and Antoine Griezmann, only to fall behind to the likes of Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi. Harry Kane doing what he does best (Photo: Michael Regan) 
And it's this kind of form which is seeing him rewarded with compliments from Arsenal legends. 
Speaking on Match of the Day 2 , former Gunner Martin Keown compared the Spurs striker to two Premier League heros. (Photo: Reuters) 
"He is now an outstanding talent," said Keown. "The biggest compliment I can pay him is he's a mixture between a Teddy Sheringham and an Alan Shearer. 
"He hits the ball like a mule and his movement, his intelligence is as good as Sheringham's was. 
"He's very important to Tottenham." poll loading Is Harry Kane the best striker in the Premier League? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
